text: Si on seerii suddiiɓe ɓen ado on meemude ɓe, tawa on jaŋtanike ɓe teŋe: ko feccere kon ko jaŋti-ɗon, si wanaa hara ɓe ya'afi maa on mo dewgal woni e juuɗe mu'un ya'afii. Ko nde ya'afotoɗon ɓurata ɓaɗtinnde gomɗal. Wata on yejjitu ɓural ngal hakkunde mo'on. pellet Alla ko Reenuɗo kala ko golloton
